name: Animals Memory: Underwater Kingdom
description:
Animals Memory: Underwater Kingdom is a card game with images of various underwater animals that will test your memory. The aim of the game is to find pairs of cards. This part of the game more difficult to pass than the first part of the game "Animals Memory" because here images are underwater animals, can be confusing.

Features:
- Different levels of difficulty. From simple to complex.
- 55 cards with images of underwater animals.
- It develops memory and is suitable for children of all ages, babies, preschoolers, school children, teenagers and adults.
- 18 levels. Ranging from lightweight to large and complex levels.
